snippet: As more people in the United States remain childless, lawyers are emphasizing the importance of setting up health care proxies and powers of attorney.
abstract: Experts are emphasizing the importance of designating caregivers, setting up health proxies and powers of attorney as more people in the United States remain childless well into old age and retirement; with childless elderly, the lines of responsibility can be uncertain and plans need to be in place.
lead_paragraph: As more people in the United States remain childless, lawyers are emphasizing the importance of setting up health care proxies and powers of attorney.

headline.seo: For Childless Older People, Legal and Logistical Challenges
headline.main: Childless and Aging? Time to Designate a Caregiver
